description_html:
Captivating proportions and colorations are created by state of the art technology in the newest addition to the Composition Cork collection. Metallic Bricks are versatile and this classic material gets an organic, modern twist with precision cut bricks in preselected sizes, thicknesses and a wide-range of metallic colorations for a high performing, fresh and cool artisanal appeal.

Composition Cork Bricks are Sound Absorbing (reduces human voice frequencies up to 50%).

Size: 200 x 100 mm and 100 x 100 mm

Thickness: Ranges from 7mm- 13 mm
